org.afree.ui

Interface Drawable

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    Block
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AFreeChart, BlockContainer, CompositeTitle, EmptyBlock, LabelBlock, LegendGraphic, LegendItemBlockContainer, LegendTitle, TextTitle, Title

    public interface Drawable
    An interface for an object that can draw itself within an area on a Canvas.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void draw(Canvas canvas, RectShape area)
      Draws the object.

    • Method Detail

      • draw

        void draw(Canvas canvas,
        RectShape area)
        Draws the object.
        Parameters:
        canvas - the graphics device.
        area - the area inside which the object should be drawn.
